Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.scenario

Class IntegrationScenarioBase

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.scenario.IntegrationScenarioBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Orchestratable<ScenarioOrchestrationInfo>, IntegrationScenarioDefinition
public abstract class IntegrationScenarioBase extends Object implements IntegrationScenarioDefinition
Base class for an integration scenario definition.

Adapter developers should extend this class and annotate it with @IntegrationScenario.

See Also:
  • IntegrationScenario

  • Method Details

    • getOrchestrator

      public Orchestrator<ScenarioOrchestrationInfo> getOrchestrator()
      Returns the orchestrator for this scenario.

      The default implementation tries to apply default-orchestrators from StandardScenarioOrchestrators automatically.

      If, in more complex cases, a custom orchestration is required, this method should be overloaded and the scenario specified in orchestration-DSL initialized via ScenarioOrchestrator.forOrchestrationDslWithResponse(Class, Consumer) or ScenarioOrchestrator.forOrchestrationDslWithoutResponse(Consumer).

      Specified by:
      getOrchestrator in interface Orchestratable<ScenarioOrchestrationInfo>
      Returns:
      Orchestrator for this scenario
      See Also:
      • ScenarioOrchestrator

    • getId

      public final String getId()
      Description copied from interface: IntegrationScenarioDefinition
      Returns the ID of the integration scenario. Must be unique within the scope of the adapter.

      The scenario identifier should typically relate to the functional/business process the integration is supporting.

      Specified by:
      getId in interface IntegrationScenarioDefinition
      Returns:
      Integration scenario identifier

    • getRequestModelClass

      public final Class<? extends Object> getRequestModelClass()
      Description copied from interface: IntegrationScenarioDefinition
      Base class of the common request model used by the scenario. The model can be shared across multiple scenarios.
      Specified by:
      getRequestModelClass in interface IntegrationScenarioDefinition
      Returns:
      Request model base class

    • getResponseModelClass

      public final Optional<Class<? extends Object>> getResponseModelClass()
      Description copied from interface: IntegrationScenarioDefinition
      Base class of the common response model used by the scenario. The model can be shared across multiple scenarios.
      Specified by:
      getResponseModelClass in interface IntegrationScenarioDefinition
      Returns:
      Response model base class, or Optional.empty() if the scenario does not have a response flow
